parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To fast, abstain from food. From nestis; to abstain from food.
Twice, entirely, utterly. Adverb from duo; twice.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To take off (deduct) a tenth part (of my property) (and give it away), pay tithe. From apo and dekatoo; to tithe.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I acquire, win, get, purchase, buy, (b) I possess, win mastery over. A primary verb; to get, i.e. Acquire.
